vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_0.sol#14-24):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)()) (patch_0.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_0.sol#21)
	- lastWithdrawTime (patch_0.sol#22)
	- locked (patch_0.sol#23)

external-function
solc-version
